```{r echo=FALSE}
repo <- "https://github.com/umccr/nemo"
vdiff <- function(new, old) {
  stopifnot(utils::compareVersion(new, old) == 1)
  htmltools::a(
    href = glue::glue("{repo}/compare/v{old}...v{new}"),
    glue::glue("v{new} - v{old} diff")
  )
}

pr_or_issue <- function(n, type) {
  x <- c(iss = "issues", pr = "pull")
  stopifnot(is.numeric(n), n > 0, type %in% names(x))
  type2 <- x[type]
  htmltools::a(
    href = glue::glue("{repo}/{type2}/{n}"),
    glue::glue("{type}{n}")
  )
}

iss <- function(n) {
  pr_or_issue(n, "iss")
}

pr <- function(n) {
  pr_or_issue(n, "pr")
}
```
